pages.text: $(li)The Bamboo Jungle is a humid climate composed of mostly of Bamboo and Podzo that can be found in the Overworld.$(br)$(li)Because the climate of this place, you can find a lot vegetation, like Bamboo, Melons, Bird of Paradise, Jungle and Oak Trees, Vines, Cocoa and Banana Bundles.

$(li)You can find animals like Leafcutter Ants, Plantain Spiders, Panda Bears, Hummingbirds, Parrots, and even Tigers.$(br)$(li)You can search this biome introducing the words $(l)Bamboo Jungle$() in the search box of the Nature's Compass.
